LanguageData.VRE_AnimalFeed.label: animalfeed
LanguageData.VRE_AnimalFeed.description: Bite the target animal and extract hemogen directly from their blood. The animal will lose blood and will be horrified by the interaction, which can result in it lashing out. A fast-acting coagulant will seal the wound to prevent bleeding.\n\nCan only target animals.
LanguageData.VRE_CorpseFeed.label: corpsefeed
LanguageData.VRE_CorpseFeed.description: Bite the target corpse and extract hemogen directly from their blood. The corpse will lose any remaining blood.\n\nCan only target human corpses.
LanguageData.VRE_SanguoFeed.label: sanguofeed
LanguageData.VRE_SanguoFeed.description: Bite the target and extract hemogen directly from their blood. The target will lose blood and will be insulted by the interaction, but will be otherwise unharmed. A fast-acting coagulant will seal the wound to prevent bleeding.\n\nCan only target hemogenic humans.
LanguageData.VRE_Ecstasy.label: ecstasy
LanguageData.VRE_Ecstasy.description: Grant a target a feeling of extreme ecstasy for a brief duration, which makes them fall head over heels with the caster.
LanguageData.VRE_HeartCrush.label: heart crush
LanguageData.VRE_HeartCrush.description: Rip out the heart of an enemy in close proximity, instantly killing them and covering the area in blood. Will only work on creatures with body size of 2 or lower. Bigger creatures will still be heavily damaged.
LanguageData.VRE_FilterInfection.label: filter infection
LanguageData.VRE_FilterInfection.description: Lay hands on a target and help the target battle their infections. Works on animals or humans.
LanguageData.VRE_Hemosmosis.label: hemosmosis
LanguageData.VRE_Hemosmosis.description: Suck blood filth from the area around the sanguophage and turn it into hemogen.
LanguageData.VRE_Resurrect.label: resurrect
LanguageData.VRE_Resurrect.description: Use archites in the bloodstream to infuse a corpse's body with new life, repairing degenerated cell structures and kickstarting vital functions. The older and worse-preserved the corpse is, the more likely it is that they will come back with memory loss or health conditions. This ability seems to exhaust the archites somehow, so it can only be used very rarely.
LanguageData.VRE_ToxicCloud.label: toxic cloud
LanguageData.VRE_ToxicCloud.description: Excrete a thick toxic smoke from special organic reservoirs in the lungs. Tox gas is deadly to almost every creature.
LanguageData.VRE_ViscuousGoo.label: viscuous goo
LanguageData.VRE_ViscuousGoo.description: Eject a projectile that explodes on impact and creates a large amount of filth that greatly slows down people trying to move through it.
LanguageData.VRE_Coagulate_SingleUse.label: coagulate
LanguageData.VRE_Coagulate_SingleUse.description: Use special glands in the wrists to quickly tend someone's wounds.
LanguageData.VRE_PiercingSpine_SingleUse.label: piercing spine
LanguageData.VRE_PiercingSpine_SingleUse.description: Use a hemogenic chemical reaction to launch a bony spine at the target. The spine exits through the skin from an opening between the collarbones. Given the method of launch, it is surprisingly easy to aim.
LanguageData.VRE_AcidSpray_SingleUse.label: acid spray
LanguageData.VRE_AcidSpray_SingleUse.description: Spray a sticky acid substance from glands in the neck up through the mouth and all over the target area. The acid will stick to targets and burn them.
LanguageData.VRE_ToxicCloud_SingleUse.label: toxic cloud
LanguageData.VRE_ToxicCloud_SingleUse.description: Excrete a thick toxic smoke from special organic reservoirs in the lungs. Tox gas is deadly to almost every creature.
LanguageData.VRE_FilterInfection_SingleUse.label: filter infection
LanguageData.VRE_FilterInfection_SingleUse.descriptio: Lay hands on a target and help the target battle their infections. Works on animals or humans.
LanguageData.VRE_Ecstasy_SingleUse.label: ecstasy
LanguageData.VRE_Ecstasy_SingleUse.description: Grant a target a feeling of extreme ecstasy for a brief duration, which makes them fall head over heels with the caster.
LanguageData.VRE_Hemosmosis_SingleUse.label: hemosmosis
LanguageData.VRE_Hemosmosis_SingleUse.description: Suck blood filth from the area around the sanguophage and turn it into hemogen.
LanguageData.VRE_ViscuousGoo_SingleUse.label: viscuous goo
LanguageData.VRE_ViscuousGoo_SingleUse.description: Eject a projectile that explodes on impact and creates a large amount of filth that greatly slows down people trying to move through it.
LanguageData.VRE_HeartCrush_SingleUse.label: heart crush
LanguageData.VRE_HeartCrush_SingleUse.description: Rip out the heart of an enemy in close proximity, instantly killing them and covering the area in blood. Will only work on creatures with body size of 2 or lower. Bigger creatures will still be heavily damaged.
